rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming space with a reception area and storage. Vastu compliant positioning for energy flow.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area designed for relaxation and entertainment. Windows on the east side ensure natural light.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: Serving as both dining and occasional workspace. Placed to allow access from the living room.

rooms.name: Studio Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen with an industrial design aesthetic. Positioned near natural light and includes efficient ventilation.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Primary bedroom with ample space for a private study area. Located in the northeast to promote positive energy.

rooms.name: En-suite Bathroom
rooms.description: Private bathroom for the master bedroom. Designed with industrial finishes and functional layout.

rooms.name: Guest Toilet
rooms.description: Small guest restroom near the entrance. Utilitarian design focusing on easy access.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Space for laundry and storage. Positioned strategically to support kitchen operations.

openings.description: Large entry door designed for easy access and security. Positioned in line with Vastu guidelines.
East-facing window in the living room to maximize natural light.
Window in entrance hall for additional ventilation and light.
Door leading to the swimming pool area located on the ground floor perimeter.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom Upper Loft
rooms.description: Expansive bedroom space with a private balcony offering stunning views. Designed for relaxation and privacy.

rooms.name: Ensuite Bathroom (Upper Loft)
rooms.description: Private bathroom adjoining the master bedroom in the upper loft. Industrial finishes for a modern look.

rooms.name: Guest Room
rooms.description: Comfortable guest room with access to natural light and ventilation. Fitted with industrial decor elements.

rooms.name: Utility Closet
rooms.description: Small storage space for linens and guest amenities. Strategically located for convenience.

openings.description: Interior staircase connecting ground and first floor. Designed with safety and ease of access in mind.
Window providing light to the master bedroom upper loft and guest room.

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace
rooms.description: Expansive terrace designed for relaxation and outdoor living. Features a swimming pool area integrated with the terrace layout.

openings.description: Safe access to the rooftop terrace from the first floor via a secured ladder system.
Door opening onto the swimming pool area integrated with the terrace.

design_notes.vastu_compliance: Key elements such as the entrance and major living spaces are aligned according to Vastu principles for optimal energy flow.
design_notes.industrial_theme: Exposed structural elements, metal finishes, and open spaces reflect an industrial design aesthetic throughout the bungalow.
design_notes.structural_integrity: The design adheres to local building codes and norms ensuring safety and durability.
design_notes.swimming_pool: The swimming pool is integrated into the ground floor layout with dedicated access, while providing ease of maintenance.
